channel.title: Softlayer_network_storage_schedule_type on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_storage_schedule_type on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Type
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Schedule_Type Datatype Description A schedule type is used to define what a schedule was created to do. When creating a schedule to take snapshots of a volume, the ‘Snapshot’ schedule type would be used. Local id A schedule type's internal identifier. Type: integer keyname A schedule type's key name, for example 'SNAPSHOT'. Type: string name A schedule type's name, for example 'Snapshot'.
